## Properties

|  [credentials](./nesbus.servicebusaadtokencredentials.credentials.md) | Parameters&lt;typeof ServiceBusClient\['createFromAadTokenCredentials'\]&gt;\[1\] | The Token credentials generated by using the \* <code>@azure/ms-rest-nodeauth</code> library. It can be one of the following: - ApplicationTokenCredentials - UserTokenCredentials - DeviceTokenCredentials - MSITokenCredentials Token audience (or resource in case of MSI based credentials) to use when creating the credentials is https://servicebus.azure.net/ |
